attributes.title: This app is HORRIBLE!!!

attributes.title: The app is awful

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!

DO NOT GET THIS APP!! I REPEAT, DO NOT GET THIS APP!!

attributes.title: 0/10 recommended, absolutely TERRIBLE
